title: research
question: What is the science popularization platform "Research Youwu"?
answer: Yanzhiyouwu is a popular science platform, established in April 2016. It mainly introduces the researchers and research results of Academia Sinica through easy-to-understand graphic reports. So far, there have been nearly 240 popular science articles, and two physical books have been published, as well as its own Facebook and IG pages. In the future, Yanzhiyouwu will continue to publish more popular science articles related to the research of Academia Sinica and expand its readership.

title: research
question: How many popular science articles has "Research Youwu" published?
answer: "Research Youwu" has published nearly 240 popular science articles.

title: research
question: What physical books have been published by "Research Youwu"?
answer: "Research Youwu" has published two physical books. The first is "Research Youwu: Traveling Through Ancient and Modern Times" published in 2010! Academia Sinica's 25 Humanities Open Classes" is a series of books from the Humanities Group. The second book is "Research and Youwu: A Book of Micro-knowledge" published in 110 years! Academia Sinica's 21 Life Science Lessons" is a series of books by the Life Group. Moreover, they expect to launch a series of books on mathematics and physics in 113 years.

title: research
question: When do they expect to launch the Mathematics Group series of books?
answer: They expect to launch a series of books on mathematics and physics in 113 years.

answer: In the future, Yanzhiyouwu plans to continue to produce popular science articles related to the research of Academia Sinica, and also strengthen cooperation with public and private sectors and different types of media to expand the readership. They expect to publish a series of books on mathematics and physics in 113 years.
